### Government Tender Notification

### Request for Proposal (RFP) Package

 **Tender Title (English) and (French):**
  - **Health Services Electronic Health Record Advisory Services**  
- **Services consultative des dossiers de santé électroniques du Services de santé**

### Tender Information

- **Contract Identification:**
  - **Solicitation Number:** 21120-24-4359655
- **Reference Number:** cb-7589-55534532
- **Publication Date:** 2023-07-26
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-18 14:00:00
- **Amendment Date:** 2023-09-18

### Brief Summary of the Tender
This tender requires a contractor to provide advisory services for the implementation of a comprehensive Electronic Health Record (EHR) system for Correctional Service Canada (CSC) Health Services. The contractor will work closely with CSC Health Services and Information Management Services to develop the content required for a market analysis, RFI, business case, Treasurer Board submission, and RFP. The proposed EHR system aims to integrate offender admission data, clinical care, quality and performance metrics, business intelligence, population health management, and integration with diagnostic imaging systems.

### Service Requirement

- **Duration of Contract:** Two years, with two optional one-year extensions
- **Level of Effort:** Estimated 560 days
- **Security Level:** No security requirements
- **Proposed Period of Contract:** Start date: after contract award, and duration of two years, plus two additional one-year options

### Ineligible Participants

- This tender is open only to those Supply Arrangement (SA) holders with Tier 1 qualification under E60ZT-18TSPS for the specified consultant categories.
